channel.title: Module 3 Prework on AWS Modernization Workshop with Sysdig

item.title: Installing the CloudConnector
item.description: Step 1. Enable AWS Security Hub To enable AWS Security Hub: Log into your Cloud9 Workspace Run the following command aws securityhub enable-security-hub --enable-default-standards Log into your AWS account with your browser then browse to AWS Security Hub. You may see a temporary red warning about AWS Config not being appropriately enabled, but it will disappear on its own once the Security Hub detects that the activation has been made.
